mapper.update:
update vmes_assist_sign_detail set state = #{state}, udate = now()
and parent_id in (${parentIds})
mapper.select:
select id id, parent_id parentId, order_id orderId, order_detail_id orderDetailId, in_detail_id inDetailId,
assist_product_id assistProductId, order_unit orderUnit, arrive_count arriveCount, quality quality, quality_type qualityType,
quality_count qualityCount, bad_count badCount, retreat_count retreatCount, receive_count receiveCount, quality_indtl_id qualityIndtlId,
receive_indtl_id receiveIndtlId, state state, sign_fine_count signFineCount, quality_fine_count qualityFineCount, cuser cuser,
cdate cdate, uuser uuser, udate udate, remark remark, isdisable isdisable from vmes_assist_sign_detail
and ${queryStr}
and code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}),'%')
and name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}),'%')
order by ${orderStr}
